commit message:
re-introduced description
stopped title and date from overlapping in list view (#16)

refactoring to get 'thinner' activities:
moved audio and vibration handling out of BeepActivity

database access refactoring, moved access methods into different classes
for better maintainability
moved image handling part out of NewSampleActivity

reworked app initialization
added check at main menu, that looks for expired scheduled beeps
issue #22: added flag that export cannot be started twice

issue #27: delete data in background thread and add progress dialog that
cannot be dismissed by the user

issue #26: notification and progress (only Android 4+) for export
change to avoid null pointer exceptions in handlers

introduced a callback function to ensure thread safety on image scaling
processes in NewSampleActivity (issue #19)

transformed export running flag into timeout, if something goes wrong
another export can be started after 2 min
fixed bugs related to image display and text regarding sample editing
fixed bugs related to database handling
make image scaling and loading more robust against device rotations
